name: StatusEpilepticus
title: Status Epilepticus
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of status epilepticus.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of status epilepticus.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
